column4: afternoon all. I'm in a heap of distress, and i really really would like to be out of it one way or another. I am getting error cannot get c/h/s value error message. I have 1 Raid 0 pair of ntfs drives, 1 500gb drive with a 10gb backtrack distro on it, and a 1 tb ntfs drive. I can't lose the 2 other drives, I want my 500gb to ultimately have backtrack and ubu 11.04. I've tried everything ive found on forums, ive tried win7 recovery dis
go to the backtrack channel then its not supported here
